mapper.select: SELECT user_code AS userCode, user_name AS userName, user_email AS userEmail, user_nickname AS userNickname FROM USER_INFO

SELECT user_code AS userCode, user_type AS userType, user_email AS userEmail, user_pw AS userPw, user_nickname AS userNickname, user_name AS userName, user_rsd_reg_num AS userRsdRegNum, user_phone_num AS userPhoneNum, user_addr AS userAddr, user_reg_dt AS userRegDt, user_status AS userStatus FROM USER_INFO WHERE user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET user_name = #{userName}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_nickname = #{userNickname}, user_phone_num = #{userPhoneNum}, user_addr = #{userAddr} WHERE user_code = #{userCode}
